00026 GrStreamingIB::GrStreamingIB( unsigned int initSize, unsigned int growExtra )
00027 : _offset( 0 )
00028 , _growExtra( growExtra )
00029 {
00031         _indexBuffer = gGrMeshBufferMgr->CreateMeshIB( initSize/2, GrMeshIB::kDynamic | GrMeshIB::kNoCopy );
00032 }
00033 
00034 //----------------------------------------------------------
00035 GrStreamingIB::~GrStreamingIB()
00036 {
00037         _indexBuffer->Evict();
00038         _indexBuffer = 0;
00039 }
00040 
00041 
00042 //==========================================================
00044 //==========================================================

00046 //----------------------------------------------------------
00047 void
00048 GrStreamingIB::AddIndices( unsigned short* indices, unsigned int count )
00049 {
00051         unsigned int sizeNeeded = _offset + count;
00052         if ( sizeNeeded > _indexBuffer->GetIndexCount() )
00053         {
00055                 URef< GrMeshIB > newIB = gGrMeshBufferMgr->CreateMeshIB( sizeNeeded + _growExtra, /*GrMeshIB::kDynamic | */GrMeshIB::kNoCopy );
00056                 CHECK_GL();
00057 
00058                 unsigned short* ptr = _indexBuffer->Map( false );
00059                 CHECK_GL();
00060 
00061                 newIB->Update( 0, ptr, _offset );
00062                 CHECK_GL();
00063 
00064                 _indexBuffer->Unmap();
00065                 CHECK_GL();
00066 
00067                 _indexBuffer->Evict();
00068 
00070                 _indexBuffer = newIB;
00071                 _indexBuffer->Bind();
00072         }
00073 
00075         _indexBuffer->Update( _offset, indices, count );
00076         _offset += count;
00077 }
00078 
00079 //----------------------------------------------------------
00080 void
00081 GrStreamingIB::Reset()
00082 {
00083         _offset = 0;
00084 }
00085 
00086 //----------------------------------------------------------
00087 void
00088 GrStreamingIB::Bind()
00089 {
00090         _indexBuffer->Bind();
00091 }
